text:
GeckoLabs | Edinburgh, UK OR London, UK | PHP Engineer

We're growing fast, and need to hire more PHP developers to join our team in either London or Edinburgh.

Experience with Laravel is a must as you'll mainly be working to improve and enhance our API. Any experience of AngularJS would be beneficial but not essential.

Apply: http://www.geckolabs.co.uk/jobs/php-software-engineer/
